exercises.name: Chest Press Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust seat so handles align with mid-chest, feet flat on floor
Execution: Press handles forward in controlled motion, pause briefly at full extension
Form cue: Keep shoulder blades pulled back against pad, avoid locking elbows completely

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust thigh pad to secure legs, grip bar slightly wider than shoulder-width
Execution: Pull bar down to upper chest, squeeze shoulder blades together
Form cue: Lead with elbows, avoid using momentum or leaning back excessively

exercises.name: Cable Shoulder Press
instructions: Setup: Set cables at shoulder height, step forward into staggered stance
Execution: Press handles overhead simultaneously, bring down to shoulder level
Form cue: Keep core engaged, avoid arching lower back during press

exercises.name: Cable Tricep Pushdowns
instructions: Setup: Set cable high with rope attachment, stand with slight forward lean
Execution: Push rope down and apart at bottom, squeeze triceps
Form cue: Keep elbows pinned to sides, control the weight on the way up

exercises.name: Cable Bicep Curls
instructions: Setup: Set cable low with straight bar, stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Execution: Curl bar up to chest level, squeeze biceps at top
Form cue: Keep elbows stationary at sides, avoid swinging or using back

exercises.name: Leg Press Machine
instructions: Setup: Sit with back flat against pad, feet shoulder-width apart on platform
Execution: Lower weight until knees reach 90 degrees, press back to start
Form cue: Keep knees aligned with toes, don't let knees cave inward

exercises.name: Leg Curl Machine (Seated)
instructions: Setup: Adjust back pad and leg pad, ankles behind lower pad
Execution: Curl heels toward glutes, squeeze hamstrings at top
Form cue: Keep back against pad, control the weight during extension

exercises.name: Leg Extension Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust back pad and ankle pad, sit with knees at 90 degrees
Execution: Extend legs until straight, pause briefly at top
Form cue: Keep back against pad, avoid jerky movements at top

exercises.name: Cable Romanian Deadlifts
instructions: Setup: Set cable low with straight bar, stand arm's length away
Execution: Hinge at hips, push hips back while lowering bar along legs
Form cue: Keep knees slightly bent, feel stretch in hamstrings

exercises.name: Calf Raise Machine
instructions: Setup: Position shoulders under pads, balls of feet on platform
Execution: Rise up on toes as high as possible, lower slowly
Form cue: Keep legs straight, pause at top for maximum contraction

exercises.name: Elliptical Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust stride and resistance to comfortable level
Execution: Maintain steady pace at 65-75% max heart rate, use arm handles for full body engagement

exercises.name: Dynamic Stretching Circuit
instructions: Step 1: Arm circles, leg swings, torso twists - 30 seconds each
Step 2: Walking lunges with rotation, high knees, butt kicks - 30 seconds each

exercises.name: Static Stretching Routine
instructions: Step 1: Hold each stretch for 30-45 seconds: chest doorway stretch, seated forward fold, figure-4 hip stretch
Step 2: Cat-cow poses, child's pose, standing quad stretch, calf stretch against wall

exercises.name: Foam Rolling
instructions: Step 1: Roll IT bands, quads, hamstrings, and calves - 60 seconds each leg
Step 2: Roll upper back, lats, and glutes - focus on tight spots with slow, controlled movements
